name: Gun Duel
description:
Are you interested in a new multiplayer 2D arcade shooter?
Then you came to the right place!

Gun Duel is a new class-based arcade shooter!
Did I mention it is fast-paced too?

Gun Duel has a super high skill curve, it won't seem like it first,
but as you play you will realize how good you can get and how many mechanics there are!

Join the Discord server!
https://discord.gg/4UPQZ2meJR
